naver-hyperclovax/HyperCLOVAX-SEED-Visio.description: Naver's HyperCLOVA X SEED Vision Instruct 3B (3.2B LLM + 0.43B Vision) model. LLaVA-based architecture run locally using Transformers/PyTorch. Supports multimodal input (text, image, video) with 16k context length. Optimized for Korean language tasks. Knowledge cutoff: August 2024.
